alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 1:16PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect Kennebec...northwestern Waldo...southeastern Oxford...Androscoggin...south central Somerset and southeastern Franklin Counties... At 115 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Waterville to 10 miles west of Turner...and moving east AT 45 MPH. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Augusta, Waterville, Farmington, Fairfield, Mechanic Falls, Oakland, Thorndike, Turner, Skowhegan, Jay, China, Litchfield, Clinton, Belgrade, Livermore Falls, Farmingdale, Manchester, Hallowell and Canton. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 105 and 142. This also includes... Crocker Hill, Streaked Mountain, and Singepole Ridge. * Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Travel is not advised during these heavy snow showers. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the snow showers pass your location. If traveling pull off to a safe location.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset
